author: Pascal Blanché
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 147 – December 2018 Cover Art Belt 71 Pascal Blanché is a French artist, with more than twenty-five years of experience in the gaming industry. By day, he works at Behaviour Interactive as Art Director. By night, he likes to work on more personal explorations and build bold new worlds. Skip to content
Issue 147 – December 2018
Cover Art
Belt 71
Pascal Blanché is a French artist, with more than twenty-five years of experience in the gaming industry. By day, he works at Behaviour Interactive as Art Director. By night, he likes to work on more personal explorations and build bold new worlds.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
